attributes.title: Hard to control
attributes.review: This app is really hard to control. If you need news just watch a non bias channel on tv and not some bias presidents app. Stay safe and wear a mask to prevent the spread of corona. BLM.

attributes.title: This app is terrible !!!
attributes.review: I just wanted to support the president when the app glitched out. It glitched so much that I threw my phone AT A WALL and broke it. I wrote this review on my toaster. Now I have to fold my dogs and walk the laundry. DELETE THE APP.
